name: Standard Wheelbarrow
description: Ideal for gardening, hauling equipment, and everyday yard work. Folds up easily for transport and compact space-saving storage. Pneumatic rubber tire is easy to steer. Rugged powder-coated metal frame is durable and polyester tarpaulin is water-repellent. Just unhook the flap and lay the tarpaulin flat on the ground to sweep, shovel, or rake debris straight in!
details: Steel handles, pu coated canvas, plastic wheel frame, foam grips
31 inches W x 56 inches D x 10 inches H
Weighs 8 lbs.
Assembly required
Protect from freezing temperatures

name: Castellari Ergonomic Anvil Pruner
description: Ideal for most pruning activities, the anvil design of this pruner ensures smooth, easy cuts. The handle design keeps your wrist in a natural position and prevents kickback — which can lead to fatigue or tendonitis. The curved counter-blade holds branches firmly during the cut and the “hollow on the blade” reduces friction and further ensures that the cut is smooth (better for the plant and you!). Blades are hot-forged high carbon steel for superior sharpness and durability. A slip-resistant coating on handles keeps your grip firm and consistent.
details: High carbon steel, hot-forged aluminum, PVC
8.27 inches L x 2.36 inches W x 0.98 inches H
Weighs 7.7 oz.

name: Gardener's Pro Pruner #2
description: Snip with confidence with our exclusive bypass pruners. Blades are long-wearing, with wire-cutting notch and sap groove. Lightweight, forged aluminum handles are coated with a non-slip comfort grip to keep them firmly in your hand and reduce fatigue. Superior quality you can count on!
details: High carbon SL-5 steel, aluminum, PVC
8-1/2 inches L
2 inches blades

name: Pocket Snips
description: Gardeners love these compact snips. The ergonomic, non-slip grip and narrow, super-sharp blades let you make precision cuts without damaging nearby stems. Perfect for harvesting herbs, flowers, fruits and vegetables, as well as light pruning and deadheading. A sliding lock lets you stow them safely.
details: Stainless steel blades with thermoplastic rubber ergonomic handles
5-1/2 inches L overall
Blades are 1-1/2 inches L

name: Telescoping Ratchet Loppers
description: Easy-to-adjust telescoping handles and large ratcheting head combine to make quick work of your most challenging pruning jobs. Anvil-style pruners like these are especially good for cutting through tough, dry wood. A non-stick coating on the blade aids in smooth cutting and easy release. Non-slip handles provide a firm grip. Blade lock keeps them safely closed when not in use. Lightweight aluminum handles and sturdy steel head.
details: Aluminum, steel, polypropylene, TPR
Handles telescope from 28 inches to 40 inches long
Jaw opens up to 2-1/2 inches wide
Weighs 4 lbs.

name: Folding Saw, 8 inches
description: When pruners and loppers don't make the cut, turn to this Japanese-style pruning saw. High-carbon steel, 8 inches serrated blade cuts through limbs up to 5-1/2 inches in diameter. Cuts on both push and pull strokes. Blade locks securely open during use, folds for safe transport and storage. The teeth are sharpened on three sides for efficient cutting and impulse hardened for durability.
details: High carbon SK-5 steel, plastic
17-1/2 inches L overall when open
Blade is 8 inches L
9-1/2 teeth per inch

name: Sun Joe Shovelution Steel Blade Shovel with Spring Assist Handle
description: Dig in and give your back a break in the yard and garden — shovel smarter, not harder! No more heavy lifting or lower back strain with the Shovelution 44” Round Point Utility Digging Shovel. This rugged, forged steel pointed 9-inch blade easily pierces both sod and soil, while the ergonomically-designed spring-assist handle sends lifting leverage to the lower hand to easily lift heavy loads of dirt and mulch, or dig up shrubs, plant trees and cut trenches with minimal effort. Shovelution greatly reduces the effort, strain and potential injury involved in shoveling, using the powerful muscles of your upper body to do the lifting and throwing to reduce back strain by up to 30%, so you can lift more, and throw farther.
details: Steel, plastic
44 inches L with 9 inches blade
Weighs 4 lbs.11 oz.
Protect from freezing temperatures

name: Gardener's Lifetime Mini Shovel
description: Our Gardener's Lifetime tools are hand-forged in Holland from the finest high-carbon Swedish boron steel by DeWit®, a fifth-generation family-owned business. Unlike stamped steel tools that tend to be flimsy, these are ready for a lifetime of use by serious gardeners. The steel tangs extend into sustainable grown hardwood handles, so that they're sturdy, ultra durable, and comfortable to use.
details: Swedish boron steel, FSC European ash wood handle
13 inches L overall; handle is 5 inches L; tool head is 5.25 inches L x 4.25 inches W
Weighs 9 oz.

name: Japanese Beetle Killer
description: Japanese beetles are voracious eaters and can cause extensive damage to many garden and landscape plants by skeletonizing leaves and ruining flowers. This pyrethrin-based insecticide is an effective way to control these pests. In addition to controlling Japanese beetles, it also controls cucumber beetles, flea beetles, cabbageworms, Colorado potato beetles, and more. Comes in a convenient, ready-to-use 32-ounce spray bottle.
details: Pyrethrins (.02%), piperonyl butoxide (0.20%)
32 ounces in ready-to-spray bottle
Always read and follow label directions carefully

name: Captain Jack's Neem Oil Spray, 32 Oz.
description: This organic, multipurpose pest control belongs in the tool shed of every gardener. Derived from the seed of the neem tree, it controls a wide variety of common garden insect pests such as aphids as well as fungal diseases. It can also be used as a dormant spray to control overwintering eggs of various insect pests.
details: Active ingredient: clarified hydrophobic extract of neem oil
32-oz. ready-to-use spray bottle
Certified organic
Always read and follow label directions carefully

name: Bio Insecticide Indoor/Outdoor
description: Prevent insect and mite build-up plus suppress soil-dwelling pests with this all-natural bio insecticide. The unique formulation utilizes good bacteria that target pests but are harmless to beneficial insects and pollinators. Help your plants thrive with this effective blend of 20+ natural compounds.
details: Heat-killed Burkholderia spp, strain A396* and spent fermentation media: 94.46%
Other Ingredients: 5.54%
Contains not less than 1,500 Beet Armyworm Killing Units (BAWKU)/mg of active ingredient.
1 pint / 16 oz. concentrate

name: Milwaukee 48226101 203mm (8 inch) Long Nose Pliers
description: The Milwaukee® 203mm (8 inch) Long Nose Pliers feature a 2 inches gripping nose for pulling wire and material through rough-in holes and other tight spaces. The pliers' head features integrated reaming ridges (patent pending) for removing burrs from the inside of smooth pipe as well as an integrated wire cutter. For added functionality, the Milwaukee® Long Nose Pliers feature an integrated fish tape puller. Milwaukee® pliers feature over-molded comfort grips, which will not peel under jobsite conditions. All Milwaukee® pliers are forged for strength and feature rust protection for long life.

name: Milwaukee 48222859 Demolition Driver
description: The Milwaukee® Demolition Driver features a reinforced full-metal core designed to give you maximum job site toughness and durability. The hammer-ready steel strike cap with the prying and chiseling tip are designed to withstand the most aggressive demolition screwdriver applications. The forged steel shank offers longer life and features a wrench-ready square design to deliver additional leverage.

Larger Strike Surfaces
Reinforced Tip
Cushion Handle

name: Kincrome K5527 14 Piece TorqueMaster Screwdriver Set
description: TorqueMaster® represents decades of fastening innovation. Incorporating a Tri-Lobe design that dovetails with the hand, and Gel-Grip for increased torque and turning power, as well as precision machined S3 SVCM Alloy Steel blades for durability. TorqueMaster® incorporates professional grade features such as colour coding and drive indicators that are visible from all angles and make it incredibly easy to find the screwdriver that you need, whether it's in your tool box or tool belt. This 13 Piece set also includes a handy storage blow moulded case (BMC) to keep your screwdrivers together, and can act as a storage tray for your tool box simply by cutting the hinges to remove the lid.
details: S3 SVCM Alloy Steel, hardened, tempered and satin chrome plated
Colour coding and drive indicators for easy identification

Tri-Lobe design that dovetails with the hand

name: Milwaukee 48220510 10m Compact Magnetic Tape Measure
description: Our Compact Magnetic Tape Measure has up to 30cm of standout and a magnet that easily attaches to EMT & steel studs. The tape is wear and impact-resistant with nylon blade protection and an additional anti-tear coating on the first 15cm of the blade, reducing tape tear. Built to withstand the jobsite, the compact measuring tapes are constructed with a 5-point reinforced frame for impact resistance.
